title: Dream interpretation of breastfeeding in a dream for a married, pregnant, and single woman

preview.html: Seeing breastfeeding in a dream Seeing breastfeeding in a dream There are elements of kindness that permeate the dreamer, especially if the breastfeeding was before the age of weaning. There are those who interpreted breastfeeding a child in a dream as an indication of evil and imprisonment for the dreamer, suffering, sickness, illnesses and pains, and God knows best. As for the one who is breastfeeding His mother in a dream, it is better for the dreamer, and he may occupy a high position and gain money and wealth, other than being breastfed by another woman. As for an adult who is breastfeeding but does not know, this dream indicates a misfortune that will spread to the dreamer. And whoever sees that he is breastfeeding a boy in a dream, this indicates To solutions to problems and learning difficulties for the dreamer. Interpretation of the vision of breastfeeding for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees that she is breastfeeding in a dream is good and high that prevails over the dreamer. Seeing a single woman breastfeeding in a dream can be a sign of a close marriage and the fulfillment of her desire. The dream may be a sign of The future and that God will bless her with offspring that will be highly appreciated. Commentators also interpreted an unmarried woman who sees herself breastfeeding in a dream as indicating that she holds a high position among her relatives and gains their trust. It may be a sign that she is religiously devoted and enjoys happiness in her life. As for the one who dreams that she is breastfeeding A baby, except for a rash. Either she cannot breastfeed at all, or she breastfeeds against her will, this dream does not bode well and indicates the misfortunes that will befall her. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees that she is breastfeeding her unborn child, this dream could be a warning sign of The imminent date of birth, especially if it is in the last months. But if it is in the first months, then this dream indicates that God will bless her with good offspring, and she will have a high status, and this will be the reason for her livelihood. Who do you see this for? Her breasts are full of milk and the size of her breasts is due to the abundance of milk, This indicates happiness, contentment, and peace of mind. Seeing a man breastfeeding a child in a dream. A man who sees in a dream that he is breastfeeding a child, this dream indicates comfort and happiness that will dominate the dreamer. If he is sick, then this dream is a sign of recovery from illness. The dream can embody Freedom from worry, anxiety, sadness, and repentance from sin. As for the one who breastfeeds an adult in his dream, this dream does not indicate compassion. Rather, it indicates sadness, affliction, and loss that permeates the dreamer. Interpretation of breastfeeding by animals: From feeding an animal that is allowed to eat, this dream indicates a fall Money, wealth, and wealth are upon the dreamer. As for whoever sees himself eating from an animal that is forbidden to eat, this indicates that he took money from a forbidden source. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing breastfeeding in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we receive your comments below. The article is on the Shamloul website and we will respond to you as quickly as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting scraps in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about collecting scraps in a dream. The two worlds.Interpretation of a dream about collecting scraps in a dream: Anyone who dreams of picking up food waste may indicate a major financial crisis that the dreamer may face at that time. Dreaming about collecting scraps in a dream may indicate distress that the dreamer may face and must ask God for help. If one sees that He picks up food waste in a dream, this may indicate that he is on the path of misguidance and must repent and return to God Almighty. When a person sees a collection of food waste in a dream, this may indicate changes that occur in his life to a large extent during those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting gold bullion in a dream. A dream about collecting gold bullion from the ground in a dream may indicate the large amount of money that the dreamer obtains during this period, thanks to God. Seeing someone collecting gold in a dream may indicate the ample sustenance that the dreamer will obtain in the future. His life during those days. Whoever sees in a dream that he was collecting gold bullion in a dream may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he was collecting gold bullion in a dream from the ground may indicate good decisions that he made. The one who had the vision in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting watches in a dream: Collecting wristwatches in a dream may be a sign of a problem that the dreamer will face in his life during those days. Seeing yourself collecting wristwatches in a dream may indicate fears that the dreamer may face, which It will disappear and he needs to ask God for help. It is possible that seeing yourself collecting wristwatches in a dream indicates the debts that the deceased will face in his life at that time, and God knows best. Seeing yourself collecting wristwatches in a dream may indicate bad news that the owner may receive Seeing during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting fish from the sea in a dream: In the event that one saw that he was collecting fish, this may indicate the huge source of livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in those days. Collecting fish in a dream can indicate wealth And the abundant money that the dreamer obtained through God’s grace. Whoever sees in his dream that he is collecting fish from the sea, this may indicate in his speech that he is an honest and sincere person. Seeing sea fish in a dream may indicate the difficulties that the dreamer has overcome in his life at that time, And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting rose seeds in a dream: Collecting rose seeds in a dream may indicate the end of fears and the near relief that the dreamer will obtain with God’s grace. Whoever saw in his dream that he was collecting rose seeds, it could indicate that he will get rid of the problems that the dreamer was facing. On those days. A dream about collecting rose seeds in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the life of the dreamer during the coming period. Whoever dreams of collecting rose seeds may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting sardines in Dreaming about picking sardines

title: A turtle dies in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation scholars have indicated that seeing the death of a turtle in a dream varies depending on the condition of the viewer and the details related to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the death of a turtle in a dream through an article by us for Dream Interpretation.Interpretation of the death of a turtle in a dreamSeeing the death of a turtle in a dream shows many different interpretations, the most important of which are Seeing the death of a turtle in a dream indicates the approach of death, anguish, anxiety, and the death of blessing and livelihood. Seeing a dead turtle in a dream also indicates the death of a person closely related to the dreamer. Likewise, whoever sees the death of a turtle in a dream, it may mean the absence of the banner of knowledge, the people of truth, and the voice of the voice of falsehood. This vision is a strong indicator of the loss of someone dear and close to the dreamer, who may be an elderly and tall person. On the other hand, the vision is an indicator of the spread of corruption, ignorance, and lack of morals and conscience. Read also: Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream. Interpretation of the death of a turtle In a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream of a turtle dying in a dream carries multiple evidence, such as: Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing a turtle dying in a dream indicates anxiety, sadness, and anguish, and then relief comes. Whoever sees a lot of dead turtles in a dream, this indicates that there will be There are great losses in his life, but the distress will pass quickly and happy things will happen in his life. And if the dreamer sees in his dream a dying turtle, this indicates the death of worries, problems, and almost comfort. As for seeing the death of a turtle in a dream, this means the loss that will occur in his life, but compensation God will come to him later. Whoever sees in his dream a sick turtle dying soon, this means illness and severe exhaustion that the fortuneteller will be exposed to in his life. Ibn Sirin also believes in his interpretation that the turtle in a dream symbolizes a very beautiful woman, her good morals, her guidance, and her beauty. Interpretation The death of a turtle in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the death of a turtle in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates something promising and the possibility of happy things. The vision also indicates contentment, happiness, sustenance, goodness, and blessings in her life. However, some dream interpretation scholars have stated that the dream of the death of a single turtle portends evil. The vision may indicate the separation of a loved one from the dreamer, the cancellation of her engagement, or the emergence of tension and pressure in her relationships with others. But seeing a turtle in a person’s dream in general is considered a good thing and indicates grace, kindness and living. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is raising a turtle in In a dream, this means that she will honor her parents, take care of them, and take care of them despite their advanced age. And if he sees himself moving away from a turtle in the dream, this indicates a feeling of indifference and boredom with study or work. It also indicates that he has received a lot of advice and sermons from those who have great experience in Field.Interpretation of the death of a turtle in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams of the death of a turtle in a dream, this indicates the instability of marital life or the occurrence of a late pregnancy. The vision may indicate the wife’s attempt to improve her relationship with her husband, and improve their relationship.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the moon splitting. The meaning of the moon splitting in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the moon splitting in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man. Either by looking at the moon, you dreamed that the moon was splitting, or you saw the moon splitting, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Splitting the moon in a dream has many connotations and interpretations, Seeing the moon is of interest to the dreamer, so through the following lines we will present the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and other scholars who see the moon in a dream, for the moon is one. Among the dreams that carry many meanings and clues that are important to us, which the dreamer must know correctly, according to the translator Ibn Kathir in his interpretations. Interpretation of the division of the moon in a dream. Whoever sees the moon being divided into two parts indicates the death of the king or one of those mentioned, and whoever sees that they are joined after the separation, it appears that the people They grieve him and ask for justice, and some of them said that his wife is sick. Interpretation of the moon in a dream: The moon symbolizes good and righteous scholars and imams. Seeing the moon in the fortuneteller’s room is evidence of marriage with a righteous girl, so her father will be righteous, whether he is a scholar or an imam. Seeing a man, the moon falling in his room, It symbolizes marriage to an infidel girl, but she will convert to faith and Islam. Seeing the moon in the shape of the sun indicates abundant sustenance and a lot of money that the dreamer will receive from his wife or father. Walking with the moon in a dream symbolizes sea travel. Talking to the moon in a dream Evidence that the dreamer has reached the highest positions. The fall of the moon indicates the death of the mother. Likewise, if the dreamer sees that the moon is in front of the sun, this indicates a political coup in the state. Seeing the sun and the moon worshiping the dreamer in a dream is evidence of his good condition and that he is a virtuous man, because It symbolizes his loyalty to his parents and their satisfaction with him. Seeing the dreamer’s face in the image of the moon is evidence of his approaching death. The glow of the moon over the dreamer’s house symbolizes that he is a man who strives to do good deeds and leads people to the paths of truth. Seeing the moon falling into the fortuneteller’s house in a dream and taking his pieces from him and placing them On the garment is evidence of the death of the newborn to the fortuneteller. A lunar eclipse in the dreamer’s dream symbolizes the death of a person of high status such as the ruler of a state or a person with great knowledge and ability. A lunar eclipse also symbolizes a lack of awareness and ignorance. Seeing an unmarried young man in his dream, and the moon and the sun coming together in His house, indicates that his marriage is imminent. Seeing a married man wearing pajamas and the moon and sun gathered in his house indicates that God has given him good offspring. Seeing the sun and moon together in the dreamer’s house symbolizes his status and his access to the highest positions. YouTube explanation of the division of the moon.

title: Interpretation of dung in a dream: Seeing animal waste in a dream

preview.html: Seeing dung for an unmarried girl, married woman, pregnant woman, divorced woman, married or unmarried woman, whether it is horse dung, cow dung, sheep droppings, droppings, eating a calf, the smell of cleanliness, etc. Ibn Sirin The meaning of dung in a dream Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that seeing manure or dung in a dream can sometimes indicate money, livelihood and money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cleaning and sweeping horse dung, then his vision shows the money that this dreamer gets in The reality is from a high-ranking person. Seeing cow dung in a dream can have good meanings and others that indicate a bad omen, according to the dreamer’s waking state. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that seeing dung or cow dung is a good vision and an indication of blessing and livelihood if the dreamer is Whoever works in agriculture. As for someone who sees cow dung in a dream without being the owners of the agriculture in reality, the dream does not bring goodness, but rather may indicate a bad omen. And whoever sees in his dream that he is sitting on an amount of animal dung, this situation indicates that The dreamer will receive some money that he will receive from one of his family members and relatives. It was said elsewhere, quoting Imam Ibn Shirin, may God have mercy on him, that seeing horse dung or cow dung in a dream indicates goodness, wealth, and livelihood that the dreamer will obtain in wakefulness. Unless this dung is Or manure, an unpleasant smell or harmful filth. If you dream of seeing fresh manure around flowers and trees, it means abundant health and good conditions. If you dream that your clothes are contaminated with unclean dirt, then you have to save yourself from infectious diseases, either by leaving your home or submitting to the restrictions of the law. If you dream that Someone is throwing dirt at you, it means that enemies will try to harm your character. Miller’s dream interpretation of a manure pileIf you dream of a manure pile, you will see profits coming from unexpected sources. For a farmer, this dream portends good luck as it indicates great seasons, abundance of crops in the soil and livestock. As for the girl, this dream suggests that she will marry a big, wealthy man without prior knowledge. Abd al-Malik al-Wardi says in the Millennium: Every animal’s dung is money according to its destiny and its scent is earned. In general, seeing the heirs of animals in a dream indicates money. If one dreams that he is sweeping up dung A horse in a dream, it means that he will get money. Sitting on animal dung in a dream is halal money if the animal is allowed to eat or pet, but if it is a predatory animal, it indicates getting money from a forbidden point of view. Solid animal waste is considered Abundant and flammable are the strongest and best interpretation. Seeing animal dung in a dream. This vision indicates goodness, healing, and the end of every disease, misery, and lack of comfort. The seer will be financially strong, and with this strength he will overcome all difficulties, gain joy, and feel that life has a beautiful meaning. Eating animal dung in a dream. This dream is for

title: Interpretation of a dream in which I was pregnant and gave birth in a dream

preview.html: Seeing that I am pregnant in a dream means overcoming problems and the arrival of happiness and joy and other interpretations that we will interpret for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a man, such as pregnancy with a boy or a girl, and the meaning of pregnancy for an unmarried woman, or I saw that I am pregnant in Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of seeing yourself pregnant in a dream If she sees herself pregnant in a dream, this indicates the support of friends for each other to face any problems in life, and the vision can express their dealing with various problems and with patience and strength they will overcome this period and work to turn a new page, whether for their friendship or for people. Seeing yourself pregnant and that the birth was with the birth of charity at the same time in a dream indicates achieving happiness in personal relationships. Feeling that you are pregnant in a dream does not bode well, as it indicates that the viewer will be exposed to an illness, and moving to the hospital and severe fatigue will make him very anxious and afraid. Seeing yourself pregnant with twins suggests that the visionary feels excitement and perseverance, as the visionary will achieve great success in his educational life and achieve happiness that he has never felt before. Seeing yourself pregnant with twins and not The ability to carry the belly indicates success and excellence, and seeing yourself pregnant with twins and a flat belly means sadness and pain. Seeing yourself pregnant many times means that you cannot enjoy happiness, because you cannot solve problems from the roots, and therefore obstacles must be removed from the roots and not just deal with daily situations. Seeing yourself pregnant and feeling sick means that the dreamer will go through things that make him feel pressure or burdens. Seeing yourself pregnant in her seventh month in a dream means that there are several numbers that will play an important role in the interpretation of dreams, as he will achieve positive changes in his life related to the number seven. Example: Starting work in a seven-story company, or buying a house number seven, or it will be his lucky number in general, and thus expresses goodness and livelihood. Seeing an unmarried woman pregnant in a dream interprets the vision as you see it, as it indicates the dreamer's marriage and his provision of children. If he is married, he will have good offspring. As for the married woman who sees that she is pregnant in a dream when she sees a pregnant married woman but she cannot give birth, this indicates that she is exposed to adverse situations. As for the birth of a boy, it indicates the nobility of the dreamer's heart that he remains pure and does not lag behind others. Pregnancy in the first month in a dream shows his connection or the effect of this number on him in his life, as his name will appear in the forefront and he will not remain equal among people in his life and he will realize the benefit and good wonderful. Seeing yourself pregnant in a dream shows the dreamer's ambition and desire to achieve many of the benefits of the world, and this vision does not indicate his evil thinking, but rather expresses his desire to enjoy and his ability to show that in his life in general. In another way, it expresses his strong desire to have good offspring, despite his inability to bear this great responsibility

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a farm and green plants in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a green farm with a beautiful color and green plants in a dream indicates that this person will get a lot of goodness and live and be optimistic about the goodness that will come to him, especially green plants, because they indicate that the person will achieve his goals and achieve everything he desires. For the safety and recovery of this person. Read also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a farm and green crops in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a farm and green crops in a dream. Seeing a farm and green plants for a married woman indicates that she will be in good health and will give birth to a new baby. But if she sees herself reaping crops in An inappropriate date, as this symbolizes the emergence of problems in her life. Seeing a married woman working on Fidel’s farm indicates that he will obtain a lot of money for her and her family. Seeing green plants for a married woman indicates that her home is calm and stable and shows her family’s equality among them. Seeing a farm and green plants in A dream for a married woman indicates that something she had been wishing for, such as a new baby, or getting a new home, will happen. Read also: Backgrounds in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a farm and green plants in a dream for a single girl. A dream about a farm for an unmarried girl indicates emotional stability in her life and God will give it to her soon A suitable husband. It also indicates her success in her life and her progress forward, whether in her professional, scientific, or emotional life, and achieving what she wants. Seeing green plants in a dream for a single woman can mean seeing paradise. If she sees herself watering the farm and planting in a dream, then this It indicates that she will enter into a love relationship with someone. Seeing farms and crops in a dream for an unmarried woman also indicates her good reputation and good behavior among people. Read also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dream Seeing a farm and green farming in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman on a farm and crops Green means that she will enjoy good luck and wealth with her newborn. But if she sees herself planting in the ground, this shows her an easy and accessible birth. If a pregnant woman sees a yellow plant in her dream, this is not good news because she will be exposed to health problems during childbirth and during pregnancy. It will be She has a lot of goodness when she sees a wide green land and the doors of livelihood and happiness open for her. Buying a farm in a dream The dream of buying a farm in a dream for a woman indicates that she will live a quiet and happy life and will do everything she wants to make her happy. As for buying a farm for a man, it means that he will enter into a great business that will succeed, And all goodness comes out of it, and he achieves large and distinguished profits from it. If a man finds himself in his dream selling his farm for a low price, this is evidence that he is greedy, and unjustly divorced his wife because of his greed for another woman. title: Interpretation of hugging in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a hug in a dream for a single woman is one of the most disturbing visions for many, especially if the hug of a dead person is different from our world or a stranger that we do not know, especially if the dreamer is like this. A girl sees that she is hugging someone she does not know or that she is married and the same thing happens to her, but through scrutiny and verification we found that the interpretations of hugs in a dream differ depending on the dreamer. The type of person and the person with whom he shared the hug in the dream. Hugs are interpreted differently depending on the gender of the viewer, as these are all signs of a happy hug that indicates good news, or some hugs are a sign of distress and trouble. Interpretation of hugging in a dream for a single womanIbn Sirin, who is one of the most famous scholars who interpret dreams, confirmed that if Someone sees that he is hugging someone he does not know, then this indicates that it suits him or his owner. But if he hugs a person and thinks that he is hugging a woman in his dream, then this indicates an abundance of goodness that comes his way, and if he sees in his dream that he is hugging a man, then this is evidence. Of the support that he will receive and the help that he will receive. And if he sees that he has embraced a dead person who has left this world, then this is evidence of long-distance travel and migration, but if this dead person is your father, or if this indicates the dreamer’s intense need for reason. Safety, housing, and peace of mind. Interpretation of hugging in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If a single, not yet married woman sees that she is hugging someone she does not know in a dream, this indicates a series of good and humanitarian news on the way to her or a close marriage to a great man. Good manners and good taste. A single man who hugs someone she knows in a dream indicates his close marriage and that his life will be full of happiness, affection, love, and compassion. But if she hugs a person and cries quietly, this indicates an abundance of goodness coming her way, and relief from the distress that has been haunting her for many days. Interpretation of an embrace in a dream for a single woman from Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that the fortress in a dream varies depending on the dreamer and his situation and position in the dream. For example: If a single man embraces a living man he knows, this indicates that he will share her life for a period of time, and this period is determined by the duration of the embrace in The dream. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is hugging a dead person, this indicates that her life will be long. However, if the dead person hugs her in the dream, this indicates that the dreamer will die soon, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. But if there is a person in the dream that you know, but you hug the dreamer tightly She does not exchange hugs, as this indicates that the person hugging her is interested in her, but the girl does not want this attention and she is doing it. He. She. Do not pay attention to him. Interpretation of hugging in a dream for a single woman: If a single girl who has never been married sees a stranger hugging her while she is crying, this indicates the great need that the dreamer feels, and she needs someone to love her and take care of her. But if the owner of the breasts in the dream is an unmarried woman The kisses were a sign of the dreamer’s imminent wedding date with someone who loves her and makes her happy. Also, seeing urine

title: Interpretation of the dream of giving a bride in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving a bride in a dream. Some people may want to know the interpretation of a dream about giving a bride in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of. Let us learn about the interpretations of the diligent scholars about this dream. The reader should know that the site managers do not provide interpretations, but rather From the heart, interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about giving a toy bride in a dream: A dream about giving his bride a toy in a dream may indicate the presence of a relationship in the coming period, thanks to God. In the event that a person dreams of taking a toy bride, this can indicate good skin that will come to insight, thanks to God. Dreaming of a bride, a toy as a gift in a dream, could indicate the fulfillment of dreams and aspirations in the corresponding period, thanks to God. If a woman sees that her husband is giving her a bride in a dream, this may indicate her imminent pregnancy or that she will give birth, thanks to God, during that period. Interpretation Dreaming of giving someone candy in a dream Giving candy in a dream may indicate the love that exists between you and God knows best. A person’s dream that he received candy from another person in a dream may indicate his closeness to him in those days, thanks to God. In the event that there is a vision of giving someone candy in A dream can indicate the abundance of goodness and ample life that the dreamer can have during this time, and God knows best. If one sees that he received sweets as a gift from another person in a dream, it may be a sign of happiness and goodness that may happen to the dreamer in the coming days. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about providing a prayer piece of paper in a dream: A dream about a gift of prayer clothes in a dream may indicate a person’s preaching during these days. If you see a gift of a prayer garment in a dream, this may indicate positive changes that occur to the visionary in his life during those days. From It is possible that seeing prayer clothes as a gift in a dream indicates happy events that will come to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Seeing offering prayer clothes in a dream could be positive developments that will happen to the dreamer in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of offering soap in a dream may Giving a gift of soap in a dream indicates the goodness and piety that the dreamer has in his life at that time. Seeing someone giving a gift of soap in a dream may indicate a new life that may happen to the dreamer in the coming days, thanks to God. In the event that A person saw that he received a gift of soap in a dream, this may be an indication of the abundance of money and a great living that the dreamer can obtain during this period, thanks to God. In the event that someone sees that he received soap as a gift in a dream, this may mean that you are taking advice From other people and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a gift of dishes in a dream: Giving away empty dishes in a dream may indicate some problems and obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life and must be prevented. A dream about someone giving a white dish in a dream may indicate the joy and happiness that comes From the dreamer, thanks to God. In the event that he sees him...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person giving a blanket

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the deceased giving a blanketDreams are the only place where we meet our dead who are dear to our hearts, where the fire of longing for them cools and we are reassured about their condition. They left them, and the dead person may need something that the person who visited him in a dream may ask for, and the dead person may come in a strange form that has a specific interpretation, or ask for things that the viewer is curious about in their interpretation. This is what the site will direct you to. Different. In this article we give the deceased in a dream and it will begin. Interpretation of a dream that the deceased gives Blanket.Interpretation of a dream about giving the deceased a blanket: The living sometimes fear seeing the dead in their dreams because they believe that this bad vision will affect the dreamer, but the interpretations related to seeing the dead differ depending on the condition of the dreamer and the condition of the dead. The dream, and therefore the dream is interpreted as good or bad and is related to the interpretation of a dream about the deceased giving a blanket. We offer the following interpretations: If the dreamer sees that he is giving the deceased a blanket, this indicates the dreamer’s need for attention and affection. If the dreamer is a man and the deceased asks him for a blanket, this is a sign of the guidance of insight. And abandoning sin. It is possible to interpret a dream about the deceased giving a blanket, which is an indication of the deceased’s need for charity and supplication. However, if the deceased in the dream is the dreamer’s father and he asks him for a blanket, then this indicates the need for his father to pray and take alms from his soul. If the dreamer covers the deceased in the dream with a blanket, this indicates A lot of good and abundant money for the dreamer, but if the deceased needs a blanket in the dream, this indicates the dreamer’s many problems. To interpret a dream in which the deceased gives a blanket, it indicates that the deceased is comfortable and at peace in his grave. If the deceased is covered in a dream next to the dreamer, this indicates the presence of sins committed by the dreamer. Read also: -Interpretation of seeing a frog in a dream by Fahd Al-OsaimiClick on the image to go to the store and complete the purchase. A gift from a dead person in a dream in general: A gift from a deceased person in a dream generally indicates that the dreamer will inherit from that deceased’s legacy in reality. If the deceased gives the dreamer a dirty dress, this means that The dream is committing a forbidden act. As for the dead person providing food to the dreamer, this indicates that sustenance comes to him from where he does not know. If the fortuneteller gives something to the dead person and does not take it, this indicates that the fortuneteller will cause evil in his life. If the dead person provides food and drink to the fortuneteller and does not eat them, this indicates a lack of money. Giving The dead person seeing an old dress means that the dreamer will become poor, and if the dead person gives some of his clothes to the fortuneteller, this indicates worry, sadness, and illness that befalls the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person giving a blanket to the living. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person giving a blanket to an unmarried woman: If the unmarried woman sees her dead mother in need of a blanket, This indicates that the dreamer lacks love and affection. A blanket in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her good fortune and the end of her troubles and pain. If the dead person is covered with a blanket, this indicates the necessity of praying zakat over him. If she sees a green blanket in her dream, this indicates her religious commitment. Read also: - Demobilization
